note.p: Daughter of Henry William Johnson Beauchamp, clergyman, and his wife, Catherine. Married George Sketchley Ffinden in 1861.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/1419/56/12)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 November 2017)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 November 2017)
